job.title: Web Developer
job.description: HW Solutions is looking for a skilled web developer who will be responsible for developing and maintaining storefronts for our company You will be working as the sole technical developer on a small team responsiblebrbrTo succeed in this role you will need to be proficient in JavaScript HTML CSS Node JS React JS and have solid knowledge and experience in programming applications C Java XSL would be helpfulbrbrStorefront Web Developer Responsibilitiesbrbr	Website and software application designing building or maintainingbr	Using scripting or authoring languages management tools content creation tools applications and digital mediabr	Conferring with teams to resolve conflicts prioritize needs develop content criteria or choose solutionsbr	Directing or performing Website updatesbr	Performing DNS Management and SSL Management using CloudFlare and IIS respectivelybr	Developing or validating test routines and schedules to ensure that test cases mimic external interfaces and address all browser and device typesbr	Maintaining an understanding of the latest Web applications and programming practices through education study and participation in conferences workshops and groupsbr	Back up files from Web sites to local directories for recoverybr	Evaluating code to ensure it meets industry standards is valid is properly structured and is compatible with browsers devices or operating systemsbr	Determining user needs by analyzing technical requirementsbrbrStorefront Web Developer Requirementsbrbr	Minimum of 3 years of relevant experience or Bachelors degree in Web development or related fieldbr	Solid knowledge and experience in programming applications Visual Studio Visual Studio Code preferredbr	Proficient in JavaScript HTML CSS Node JS React JSbr	Proficient in SQL MSSQLbr	Other useful skills C Java XSL XMPie  uStorebr	Dedicated team playerbr	Great written verbal presentation and communication skillsbr	Knowledge of programming language and technical terminologybr	Able to develop ideas and processes and clearly express thembr	Ability to function well with limited supervision and directionbr	Must maintain solid attention to detail with the ability to follow through on commitmentsbr	Ability to function well with limited supervision and directionbrbrHW Solutions supports a diverse workforce and is an Equal Opportunity Employer who does not discriminate against individuals on the basis of race gender color religion national origin age sexual orientation gender identity disability veteran status or other classification protected by law HW is a Drug Free Workplace with a Zero Tolerance Substance Abuse Policy and participates in the Georgia Drug Free Workplace Program
